resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106564</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106564</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201850</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Shop Around </string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kaufen Sie Herum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comparez les prix</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Compre Ao redor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Acquisti Intorno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατάστημα γύρω</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Haga compras Alrededor</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will learn how tobacco is advertised in different ways throughout their community. Using TIGed Collaborations, students can learn how tobacco is advertised in other parts of the world.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer erlernen, wie Tabak in den 
unterschiedlichen Methoden während ihrer Gemeinschaft bekanntgemacht 
wird. Mit TIGed Collaborations, können Kursteilnehmer erlernen,
wie Tabak in anderen Teilen der Welt bekanntgemacht wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants apprendront comment du tabac est 
annoncé dans différentes voies dans toute leur communauté. En
utilisant TIGed Collaborations, les étudiants peuvent apprendre 
comment du tabac est annoncé dans d'autres régions du monde.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes aprenderão como o tabaco é 
anunciado em maneiras diferentes durante todo sua comunidade. 
Usando TIGed Collaborations, os estudantes podem aprender como o
tabaco é anunciado em outras partes do mundo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi impareranno come il tabacco è fatto 
pubblicità a nei modi differenti in tutta la loro Comunità. 
Usando TIGed Collaborations, gli allievi possono imparare come 
il tabacco è fatto pubblicità a in altre parti del mondo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα μάθουν πώς ο καπνός διαφημίζεται με 
τους διαφορετικούς τρόπους σε όλη την κοινότητά τους. 
Χρησιμοποιώντας τις συνεργασίες TIGed, οι σπουδαστές 
μπορούν να μάθουν πώς ο καπνός διαφημίζεται σε άλλα μέρη του 
κόσμου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes aprenderán cómo el tabaco se 
anuncia de diversas maneras a través de su comunidad. Usando 
TIGed Collaborations, los estudiantes pueden aprender cómo el tabaco 
se anuncia en otras partes del mundo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201850</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Free to use or adapt for educational purposes only</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106564</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/shop-around</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
